Welcome back to Corporate Survivor: Vimeo Edition. Ten percent of the family has just been voted off the island.”

Yep. Vimeo’s CEO is out here calling the company a family… right before chopping 10% of that family. Because nothing says “we love you” like layoffs, COBRA healthcare, and a water bottle with the logo on it.

In this video, I break down Vimeo’s corporate cringe — from firing grandma for “not scaling with the vision,” to celebrating interns with bucket hats 60 days before laying people off. We’ll roast the fake “we’re a family” narrative, the weird CEO posts, the Glassdoor reviews, and why compa
title: MORE PROOF COMPANIES ARE NOT YOUR FAMILY!
